original_title: Instrumentos da Música Popular Brasileira - A Cuíca
overview: Testimony by instrumentalist Osvaldinho da Cuíca with historical explanation of the presence of cuíca in several countries around the world and its popularization in Brazil based on samba. Osvaldinho gives tips on how to extract the sound from the instrument and makes a presentation at the Casa Verde Samba School Mocidade Alegre.
title: Instrumentos da Música Popular Brasileira - A Cuíca
